Primary Text: Specific Requirements
Functionality
Sell Configured to Ordered Products
The system shall display all the products that can be configured.

Name: GetAllProducts
Primary Text: Displays a non-zero length list if at least one product exists.

Name: GetAllConfigurableProducts
Primary Text: Displays a non-zero length list if at least one configurable product exists.

Name: GetAllNonConfigurableProducts
Primary Text: Displays a non-zero length list if at least one non-configurable product exists.
The system shall allow user to select the product to configure.

Name: UserSelectsValidProduct
Primary Text: Indicates a valid product was selected.

Name: UserSelectsInvalidProduct
Primary Text: Indicates an invalid product was selected.
The system shall display all the available components of the product to configure.

Name: ReturnOneConfigurableElement
Primary Text: Indicates a single configurable element of the product with one configurable element.

Name: ReturnMultipleConfigurableElements
Primary Text: Indicates 5 configurable elements of the product with 5 configurable elements.
The system shall enable user to add one or more component to the configuration.

Name: UserCanConfigure
Primary Text: Returns the configuration specified by the user for a product.
The system shall notify the user about any conflict in the current configuration.

Name: ErrorIfNonConfigurable
Primary Text: Returns an error if the user attempts to configure a non-configurable product.
The system shall allow user to update the configuration to resolve conflict in the current configuration.

Name: RetryImmediatelyAfterError
Primary Text: The user may configure a valid product after attempting to configure an invalid product.
The system shall allow user to confirm the completion of current configuration.
Provide comprehensive product details.
The system shall display detailed information of the selected products.

Name: DisplayDetailsForValidProduct
Primary Text: Returns the details of a valid product.

Name: ReturnErrorForInvalidProduct
Primary Text: Returns an error for an invalid product.
The system shall provide browsing options to see product details.

Name: CatalogSelectionToDetails
Primary Text: The user may retrieve the catalog, select a product, and get its details.
Detailed product Categorizations
The system shall display detailed product categorization to the user.

Name: DisplayProductCategories
Primary Text: The user may retrieve product categories.
Provide Search facility.
The system shall enable user to enter the search text on the screen.

Name: SearchAPIExists
Primary Text: Confirms the search API exists.
The system shall enable user to select multiple options on the screen to search.
The system shall display all the matching products based on the search.

Name: ResultsFound
Primary Text: Indicates results for existing products.
The system shall display only 10 matching result on the current screen.

Name: PaginationLimit
Primary Text: Response is limited to 10 returned items.
The system shall enable user to navigate between the search results.
The system shall notify the user when no matching product is found on the search.

Name: NoResultsFound
Primary Text: Indicates no results are found if a product doesn't exist.
Maintain customer profile.
The system shall allow user to create profile and set his credential.

Name: CreateUserProfile
Primary Text: Allows the caller to create a user profile, including a password.
The system shall authenticate user credentials to view the profile.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall allow user to update the profile information.

Name: UpdateUserProfile
Primary Text: Allows the caller to update a user profile
Provide personalized profile
The system shall display both the active and completed order history in the customer profile.

Name: DisplayEmptyOrderHistory
Primary Text: Return an empty order history if user has no active or completed orders.

Name: CreateActiveOrder
Primary Text: Create an active order.

Name: CreateCompletedOrder
Primary Text: Create a completed order.

Name: DisplayPopulatedOrderHistoryAll
Primary Text: Return a complete order history if user has active and completed orders.

Name: DisplayPopulatedOrderHistoryActive
Primary Text: Return a complete order history if user has active orders.

Name: DisplayPopulatedOrderHistoryCompleted
Primary Text: Return a complete order history if user has completed orders.
The system shall allow user to select the order from the order history.
The system shall display the detailed information about the selected order.

Name: DisplayOrderDetailsForValidOrder
Primary Text: Returns the full order details

Name: DisplayErrorForInvalidOrder
Primary Text: Indicates an error if the order doesn't exist.
The system shall display the most frequently searched items by the user in the profile.
The system shall allow user to register for newsletters and surveys in the profile.

Name: RegisterForNewsletters
Primary Text: User may update profile to register for the newsletters.

Name: RegisterForSurveys
Primary Text: User may update profile to register for the surveys.
Provide Customer Support
The system shall provide online help, FAQ’s customer support, and sitemap options for customer support.

Name: GeneralHelpRequested
Primary Text: Displays help information.
The system shall allow user to select the support type he wants.
The system shall allow user to enter the customer and product information for the support.

Name: SupportAPI
Primary Text: Customer can invoke the stubbed Support API with customer and product information.
The system shall display the customer support contact numbers on the screen.

Name: GetCustomerSupportNumbers
Primary Text: Customer can invoke the stubbed Support API with customer and product information.
The system shall allow user to enter the contact number for support personnel to call.

Name: CallbackNumberInProfile
Primary Text: The user may include a callback number in the profile.
The system shall display the online help upon request.

Name: DetailedHelpRequested
Primary Text: Displays help information.
The system shall display the FAQ’s upon request.

Name: FAQRequested
Primary Text: Displays the FAQ.
Email confirmation
The system shall maintain customer email information as a required part of customer profile.

Name: UserEmailInProfile
Primary Text: User profile includes an email address

Name: UserDoesNotExist
Primary Text: Error if user does not exist
The system shall send an order confirmation to the user through email.
Detailed invoice for customer
The system shall display detailed invoice for current order once it is confirmed.
The system shall optionally allow user to print the invoice.
Provide shopping cart facility.
The system shall provide shopping cart during online purchase.

Name: DisplayEmptyCart
Primary Text: System displays an empty cart if it is empty.

Name: DisplayPopulatedCart
Primary Text: System displays a populated cart if it is populated.
The system shall allow user to add/remove products in the shopping cart.

Name: AddItemsToCart
Primary Text: User may add items to cart

Name: RemoveItemsFromCart
Primary Text: User may remove items from a populated cart.

Name: ErrorOnRemoveItemsFromEmpty
Primary Text: User receives an error for attempting to remove an item from an empty cart.

Name: ErrorOnRemoveInvalidItem
Primary Text: User receives an error for attempting to remove an invalid item.

Name: ErrorOnRemoveNonExistentItem
Primary Text: User receives an error for attempting to remove a valid item that's not in the cart.
Provide multiple shipping methods.
The system shall display different shipping options provided by shipping department.

Name: GetShippingOptions
Primary Text: User receives a list of shipping options.
The system shall enable user to select the shipping method during payment process.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall display the shipping charges.

Name: GetShippingCharges
Primary Text: User receives a list of shipping charges.
The system shall display tentative duration for shipping.

Name: GetShippingDuration
Primary Text: User receives a list of shipping durations.
Online tracking of shipments
The system shall allow user to enter the order information for tracking.

Name: GetInfoForValidOrder
Primary Text: User receives information on a valid order.

Name: ErrorOnInvalidOrder
Primary Text: User receives an error when requesting info on an invalid order.
The system shall display the current tracking information about the order.

Name: GetTrackingInfoForValidOrder
Primary Text: User receives tracking information on a valid order.

Name: ErrorOnTrackingInvalidOrder
Primary Text: User receives an error when requesting tracking info on an invalid order.
Provide online Tax Calculations
The system shall calculate tax for the order.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall display tax information for the order.

Name: GetTaxInfoOnValidOrder
Primary Text: User receives tax info on the order.

Name: ErrorOnTaxInfoForInvalidOrder
Primary Text: User receives an error if an invalid order is provided.
Allow multiple payment methods.
The system shall display available payment methods for payment.

Name: GetPaymentMethods
Primary Text: User receives a list of available payment methods.
The system shall allow user to select the payment method for order.
Allow online change or cancellation of order.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall display the orders that are eligible to change.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Name: GetMutableOrders
Primary Text: User receives a list of orders that can be changed.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall allow user to select the order to be changed.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall allow user to cancel the order
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Name: CancelActiveOrder
Primary Text: User received indication that order has been cancelled.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Name: CancelCancelledOrder
Primary Text: User received indication that order is already cancelled.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall allow user to change shipping, payment method.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Name: ModifyOrderShipping
Primary Text: User may modify an order's shipping method.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Name: ModifyOrderPaymentMethod
Primary Text: User may modify an order's payment method.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall notify the user about any changes made to the order.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Allow Online Product reviews and ratings
Description: Allow Online Product reviews and ratings

Primary Text: The system shall display the reviews and ratings of each product, when it is selected.
Description: Allow Online Product reviews and ratings

Name: GetProductReviews
Primary Text: User receives a list of reviews for the specified product.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall enable the user to enter their reviews and ratings.
Description: Allow Online Product reviews and ratings
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Offer financing options.
The system shall display all the available financing options.

Name: GetFinancingOptions
Primary Text: User receives a list of financing options.
Description: Allow online change or cancellation of order.

Primary Text: The system shall allow user to select the financing option.
The system shall notify the user about the financing request.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Provide detailed sitemap.
The system shall allow user to view detailed sitemap.
Offer online promotions and rewards.
The system shall display all the available promotions to the user.

Name: GetAvailablePromotions
Primary Text: User receives a list of available promotions.
The system shall allow user to select available promotion.
Online Purchase of products.
The system shall allow user to confirm the purchase.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall enable user to enter the payment information.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Usability
Usability: Graphical User Interface
The system shall provide a uniform look and feel between all the web pages.
The system shall provide a digital image for each product in the product catalog.
The system shall provide use of icons and toolbars.
Usability: Accessibility
The system shall provide handicap access.
The system shall provide multi language support.
Reliability & Availability
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Reliability & Availability: Back-end Internal Computers
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall provide storage of all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall provide for replication of databases to off-site storage locations.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall provide RAID V Disk Stripping on all database storage disks.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Internet Service Provider
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider who can provide 99.999% availability through their network facilities onto the internet.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Performance
The product shall be based on web and has to be run from a web server.

Name: PerformHealthCheck
Primary Text: Endpoint responds to a simple HTTP request.
The product shall take initial load time depending on internet connection strength which also depends on the media from which the product is run.

Name: PerformReadinessCheck
Primary Text: Endpoint is ready within 5 seconds.
The performance shall depend upon hardware components of the client/customer.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Security
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Data Transfer
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall use secure sockets in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing any of the user’s confidential information.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Data Storage
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s password.  It shall always be echoed with special characters representing typed characters.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s credit card number after retrieving from the database.  It shall always be shown with just the last 4 digits of the credit card number.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system’s back-end servers shall never display a customer’s password.  The customer’s password may be reset but never shown.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system’s back-end servers shall only be accessible to authenticated administrators.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system’s back-end databases shall be encrypted.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Supportability
Configuration Management Tool
The source code developed for this system shall be maintained in configuration management tool.
Design Constraints
Standard Development Tools
The system shall be built using a standard web page development tool that conforms to either IBM’s CUA standards or Microsoft’s GUI standards.
Web Based Products
There are no memory requirements.
The computers must be equipped with web browsers such as Internet explorer.
The product must be stored in such a way that allows the client easy access to it.
Response time for loading the product should take no longer than five minutes.
A general knowledge of basic computer skills is required to use the product.
On-line User Documentation and Help System Requirements
Description: On-line User Documentation and Help System Requirements

Primary Text: As the product is E-store, On-line help system becomes a critical component of the system which shall provide
Description: On-line User Documentation and Help System Requirements

Primary Text: It shall provide specific guidelines to a user for using the E-Store system and within the system.
Description: On-line User Documentation and Help System Requirements

Primary Text: To implement online user help, link and search fields shall be provided.
Description: On-line User Documentation and Help System Requirements

Primary Text: Interfaces
User Interfaces
The user interface for the software shall be compatible to any browser such as Internet Explorer, Mozilla or Netscape Navigator by which user can access to the system.

Name: UseBroswerToUseAPI
Primary Text: Use a modern browser to execute an API method.
The user interface shall be implemented using any tool or software package like Java Applet, MS Front Page, EJB etc.
Hardware Interfaces
Since the application must run over the internet, all the hardware shall require to connect internet will be hardware interface for the system. As for e.g. Modem, WAN – LAN, Ethernet Cross-Cable.

Name: DeployToCluster
Primary Text: Run the microservice via a container daemon.
Software Interfaces
The e-store system shall communicate with the Configurator to identify all the available components to configure the product.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store shall communicate with the content manager to get the product specifications, offerings and promotions.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with bill-pay system to identify available payment methods , validate the payments and process payment.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate to credit management system for handling financing options.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with CRM system to provide support.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with Sales system for order management.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with shipping system for tracking orders and updating of shipping methods.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with external Tax system to calculate tax.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The e-store system shall communicate with export regulation system to validate export regulations.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: The system shall be VeriSign-like software which shall allow the users to complete secured transaction. This usually shall be the third party software system which is widely used for internet transaction.
Justification: Not a full implementation for production use.

Primary Text: Communications Interfaces
The e-store system shall use the HTTP protocol for communication over the internet and for the intranet communication will be through TCP/IP protocol suite.
The Port number used will be 80.
There shall be logical address of the system in IPv4 format.
Legal, Copyright, and Other Notices
E-store should display the disclaimers, copyright, word mark, trademark and product warranties of the Marvel electronics and home entertainment.
